haxe.reactive.SignalSignal

type
class

Static Methods

flatten<T>(signal : Signal<Signal<T>>) : Signal<T>

parameters
streams The Signal of Signals to be flattened.
Converts an Signal of Signals into a single Signal, whose values represent those of the last Signal to have an Event.

join<T>(signal : Signal<Signal<T>>) : Signal<T>

parameters
streams The Signal of Signals to be flattened.
Converts an Signal of Signals into a single Signal, whose values represent those of the last Signal to have an Event.

parameters
streams The Signal of Signals to be flattened.
Converts an Signal of Signals into a single Signal, whose values represent those of the last Signal to have an Event.
